title: $:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar
author: TonGerner
name: Tiddlersbar
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="http://tw5custom.tiddlyspot.com/">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="http://tw5custom.tiddlyspot.com/"/> This plugin - based on Buggy j's [[StoryTopTabs plugin|http://bjtools.tiddlyspot.com/#StoryTopTabs]] - creates a 'Tiddlersbar' of open tiddlers (as tabs) on top of the screen. It works best in Zoomin view.
The Tiddlersbar can be toggled on/off (<>/<>) with a button in the Page toolbar and/or the View toolbar. <<< ''Note:''
''This plugin needs my $:/plugins/tg/layout plugin for general layout settings (available at http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/).'' <<< Settings for the layout can be found in ''~ControlPanel > Appearance > [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks]]''.
